content: adorn your neckline with this juicy crochet collar stitched in red heart super saver this cute cherry themed collar is a fun way to accessorize your renaissance costume practice single_crochet double_crochet chain stitch embroidery and more explore all the colors from super saver and make versions that match all your moods whether it s to finish a costume or to go retro it s sure to add distinctive flair to your look materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds /333 m contrast a aran 0313 1 ball or 50 yds/46 m contrast b perfect pink 0706 1 ball or 40 yds/36 5 m contrast c cherry red 0319 1 ball or 6 yds/5 5 m contrast d medium thyme 0406 1 ball or 6 yds/5 5 m size one size to fit adult
